modName: Mod Request-Vanilla Homes Workbenches and Grindstones
summary: adds workbenches and grindstones to the 5 vanilla skyirm houses.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][u][b][size=5]Description[/size][/b][/u][/color]
This is a mod request. It is very precise and I will not be updating it unless the requester asks me to. That said, this mod alters all 5 vanilla homes very slightly:
Breezehome: A tiny basment has been added. The door is under the stairs. In the tiny basement is an enchanting table, a workbench and a grindstone

Honeyside: A workbench and grindstone have been added in the basement right by the bottom of the stairs. 

Vlindrel Hall: A grindstone and workbench has been added  right outside the Alchemy Lab/Child Bedroom. 

Hjerim: A workbench and grindstone have been added upstairs by the end of the hall between your bedroom and your stewards bedroom.

Proudspire Manor: A grindstone and workbench have been added right by the fire pit in the basement. 

I have removed a few things to make room, although nothing major. It was mostly just straw, a bookcase, a shelf, and some boxes. 

Feel free to leave any comments you desire.

Sincerely,
Bozzz123

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6888730/?tb=mods&pUp=1][b][size=5]Check Out My Mods[/size][/b][/url]
author: Bozzz123
